title: About
content:
Uranium Technologies is a veteran physical uranium trader turned data engineer and software developer. He built a customer relationship management tool for a European trader and is the developer of uraniumtech.app, a web app that combines automated data pipelines of public data sets with nearly a decade of experience in Uranium and commodities.


Uranium Technologies is a Limited Liability Corporation registered in the State of Ohio. Please email Bryan [at] uraniumtechnologies [dot] com for any inquiries.
